com.xaguzman.artemiscommons.systems.sprite

Class SpriteAssetSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.artemis.BaseSystem
      • com.xaguzman.artemiscommons.systems.base.PassiveSystem
        • com.xaguzman.artemiscommons.systems.sprite.SpriteAssetSystem

  • public class SpriteAssetSystem
extends PassiveSystem
    Stores information about static sprites, bitmapfonts and animations procedent from a TextureAtlas Created by gdlxguzm on 4/3/2017.

      • addAtlas

        public void addAtlas(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureAtlas atlas,
                     java.lang.String id)
        will read all the static sprites comming from the given texture atlas. The provided texture atlas will be disposed once this system is disposed TO READ ANIMATIONS YOU NEED TO CALL loadAnimation(String, String, float)

      • addAtlas

        public void addAtlas(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureAtlas atlas,
                     java.lang.String id,
                     boolean ownAtlas)

        Reads all the static sprites comming from the given texture atlas.

        This system will store and dispose the texture atlas if ownAtlas is true TO READ ANIMATIONS YOU NEED TO CALL loadAnimation(String, String, float)

      • createAnimation

        public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation createAnimation(java.lang.String animationId,
                                                               com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion[] frames,
                                                               float frameDuration)
        Register an animation from spritesheet (retrieved by calling spriteSheet(String, int, int))

        No padding / margin between each frame is supported at the moment

        After registering this, the animation will be available through getAnimation(String) by providing the the given animationId.

      • loadAnimation

        public void loadAnimation(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation animation,
                          java.lang.String animationId)
        Adds an animation to the asset system

      • spriteSheet

        public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion[][] spriteSheet(java.lang.String regionId,
                                                                   int width,
                                                                   int height)

        Creates a spritesheet from the given regionId with the width,height dimensions.

        After retrieving the Spritesheet, the animations stored in it can be registered in this system by calling createAnimation(String, TextureRegion[], float)

        After registering this, the animation will be available through getAnimation(String) by providing the the given animationId. The textureRegion with the given id must already be part of the registered atlases

        The animations in the spritesheet are assumed to be 1 row per animation. No padding / margin between each frame is supported at the moment

      • spriteSheetT

        public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion[][] spriteSheetT(java.lang.String textureId,
                                                                    int width,
                                                                    int height)

        Creates a spritesheet from the given textureId with the width,height dimensions.

        After retrieving the Spritesheet, the animations stored in it can be registered in this system by calling createAnimation(String, TextureRegion[], float)

        After registering this, the animation will be available through getAnimation(String) by providing the the given animationId. The textureRegion with the given id must already be part of the registered atlases

        The animations in the spritesheet are assumed to be 1 row per animation. No padding / margin between each frame is supported at the moment
